  • Link: https://www.pressherald.com/2020/04/21/tie-a-yellow-ribbon-round-that-old-clynk-bag/

    To keep workers safe, tie a ribbon ’round that old … Clynk bag? Link: https://www.pressherald.com/2020/04/21/tie-a-yellow-ribbon-round-that-old-clynk-bag/

    Clynk, one redemption operation still open during the pandemic, is asking customers to reduce risk to its workers by tying off bags and then waiting 3 days before dropping them off, signaling compliance by affixing ribbons or string.
